Metadata: What is the California commercial fishing apprenticeship program? (video)

The California Sea Grant Commercial Fishing Apprentice Program (planned launch 2020) will help educate young people about the opportunities in commercial fishing, as well as the regulations, skills and co-management approaches necessary to keep commercial fishing economically, ecologically and socially sustainable. https://go.ucsd​.edu/2imTkyJ This film was produced by Scripps Institution of Oceanography Master of Advanced Studies Marine Biodiversity and Conservation students Lindsay Bauman, Simona Clausnitzer, Kevin Huang, Lauren Martin, and Andrea Sanchez Davidson. They filmed and edited the video during in three days during the program's film week.
